projects.name: SimpleBlog
projects.description: A mini blogging platform. Features include: browse, post, edit, delete, and search  blog posts, follow/unfollow bloggers, send private messages, and notifications.

projects.name: Filmogram
projects.description: A social network similar to instagram/flickr. Features include: browse and post photos, like photos, comment on photos, follow/unfollow other users, and notifications.
